files.patch:
@@ -486,1 +486,8 @@
-LIBFONTMANAGER_OPTIMIZATION := HIGHEST
+
+ifeq ($(TOOLCHAIN_TYPE), gcc)
+  # gcc is particularly bad at handling the harfbuzz source code
+  # Turning on optimizations cause a massive spike in compile time
+  LIBFONTMANAGER_OPTIMIZATION := SIZE
+else
+  LIBFONTMANAGER_OPTIMIZATION := HIGHEST
+endif
